remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需 XSD 資料類型的詳細資訊，請參閱 < XML 資料類型參考 > 在 MSDN Library 中[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)。For more information about XSD data types, see the "XML Data Types Reference" in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用中的成員類別之間進行轉換物件和 XSD`gMonthDay`字串。The following code example shows how to use the members in the class to convert between a object and an XSD `gMonthDay` string. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是能夠剖析以各種格式的字串。The method is capable of parsing strings in various formats. 可辨識的字串格式是由下表所示的格式模式所組成。The recognizable string formats are composed out of the format patterns shown in the following table. |格式模式Format Pattern|描述Description|範例Examples| |--------------------|-----------------|--------------| |MMMM|數字的月份。The numeric month. 單一位數的月份會有前置零。Single-digit months have a leading zero.|11, 0511, 05| |dddd|月份天數。The day of the month. 單一位數的天數會有前置零。Single-digit days have a leading zero.|23, 0923, 09| |zzzzzz|完整時區位移 （小時和分鐘） 從 Universal Time Coordinate （格林威治標準時間）。The full time zone offset (hour and minutes) from the Universal Time Coordinate (Greenwich Mean Time). 一位數的小時有前置零。Single-digit hours have a leading zero.|-07:00, 08:00-07:00, 08:00| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. 這個程式碼範例是所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example that is provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapMonthDay#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapMonthDay/CPP/demo.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapMonthDay#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapMonthDay/CS/demo.cs#11)]

exception.span: 不包含對應至任何可辨識之格式模式的日期和時間。

span.span: does not contain a date and time that corresponds to any of the recognized format patterns.
